feed.title: AIoT Lab
feed.subtitle: We are AIoT lab from Shanghai Jiao Tong University, our team specializes in cutting-edge research on wireless sensing and communication, fields that are pivotal to the furture life. We are constantly on the lookout for passionate and talented individuals who share our vision for the future of technology. If you are a student interested in pushing the boundaries of AI and IoT, we welcome you to join our team. Together, we can shape the future of intelligent systems and create solutions that have a profound impact on society.
